imdb.plot outline: 'Presenter Search on 3' is a reality show format that sees a nationwide audition process where thousands of presenter hopefuls auditioned for one of three dream jobs as hosts on South Africa's most popular lifestyle television shows. After the mass auditions at stadium venues in four major cities, 30 finalists were chosen to attend master classes with respected industry veterans. The top 10 finalists then underwent an intensive 8 week process of weekly presenting challenges and eliminations before the top 6 were jetted off to the tropical island paradise of Zanzibar for the final elimination and then announcement of the three winners.
imdb.title: Presenter Search on 3
plot: '_Presenter Search on 3_ (qv)' is a reality show format that sees a nationwide audition process where thousands of presenter hopefuls auditioned for one of three dream jobs as hosts on South Africa's most popular lifestyle television shows. After the mass auditions at stadium venues in four major cities, 30 finalists were chosen to attend master classes with respected industry veterans. The top 10 finalists then underwent an intensive 8 week process of weekly presenting challenges and eliminations before the top 6 were jetted off to the tropical island paradise of Zanzibar for the final elimination and then announcement of the three winners.::Lars Schwinges
